title: Warring Kingdoms Nidalee was just on sale, less then an hour ago. Is it too late?
body: I was gonna buy it but I was too late.

replies.body: I'd like to be able to help with this, but we currently don't provide individual sale extensions.  One of the reasons for that is it wouldn't be fair to other players who may have also missed it.  We've also been trying to give everyone a heads up of [upcoming sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-sales-schedule-0), which may help out in the future.  Hope that helps!
